dmca.title: [ABUSE] Notice of Copyright Infringement under DMCA
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, December 07, 2004 12:58 PM
To: legal-response@theplanet.com
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] Notice of Copyright Infringement under DMCA

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1


Forwarding to Legal for review.

- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/


This is a forwarded message
From: Mike Watso <copyright@nukepirates.com>
To: abuse@theplanet.com
Date: Tuesday, December 7, 2004, 4:41:50 AM
Subject: [ABUSE] Notice of Copyright Infringement under DMCA

===8<==============Original message text===============

Internet Copyright Enforcement
P.O. Box 11133
Bakersfield, CA 93389-1133
(661) 665-8157  E-mail:  Piratekiller@NukePirates.com

December 7, 2004

DMCA Notice #: 120704-01
IP#: 69.41.236.26
re: Poser 5 Software
URL: http://www.3dlinks.com/shop/search_categories.cfm?categoryid=9

ELECTRONIC NOTICE OF COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT

I, the undersigned, CERTIFY UNDER PENALTY OF PERJURY that I am an agent
authorized to act on behalf of the owner of certain intellectual property
rights, said owners being named:

Curious Labs, Inc., Santa Cruz, California, USA

I have a good faith belief that the items or materials listed below are not
authorized by the above IP Owners, their agents, or the law and therefore
infringe the IP Owner's rights. Please act expeditiously to remove or
disable access to the material or items claimed to be infringing.

I may be contacted at:

Printed Name: P. Vandruff
Title:  Internet Copyright Enforcement
Company: Legal Research Associates, LP
Street Address:  PO Box 11133
City and State:  Bakersfield, CA
Zip:  93389-1133
Email (correspondence):  PirateKiller@NukePirates.com
Telephone:  (661) 665-8157
Fax:  (661) 665-8157

Truthfully,
/S/: P. Vandruff

Allegedly Infringing items or materials:

Infringed Work or Right:
Poser 5

Original Materials & Copyright Holder(s):
Copyrighted materials belonging to Curious Labs, Inc.:

Location of ORIGINAL WORKS:
http://www.curiouslabs.com/

URL(s) of Infringed Works or Right:
http://www.3dlinks.com/shop/search_categories.cfm?categoryid=9




Unless otherwise indicated, the information in this transmittal is
CONFIDENTIAL and intended only for the recipient listed above. If you are
not the addressee indicated in this message (or responsible for delivery of
the message to such person), you may not copy or deliver this message to
anyone. In such case, you should destroy this message and kindly notify the
sender by reply mail.
Unless otherwise indicated, the information in this transmittal is
CONFIDENTIAL and intended only for the recipient listed above. If you are
not the addressee indicated in this message (or responsible for delivery of
the message to such person), you may not copy or deliver this message to
anyone. In such case, you should destroy this message and kindly notify the
sender by reply mail.
===8<===========End of original message text===========
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)

iD8DBQFBtf0lvK/XpJs6oyURAp7lAJ9gdEZj2j8TdQqnjNXRp9vNlnrcRQCgrMBT
SZzzbejhrhwYHpZEyARonD0=
=npCs
-----END PGP SIGNATURE----
